CustomField.formula:
if ( Active__c && !isblank(Parent_Object__c) && !( isblank(Child_Object__c) && isblank(Snapshot_Object__c) ) && !isblank(text(Frequency__c)) && Active_Fields__c > 0
&& if ( !isblank(Child_Object__c) && (isblank(Child_Relationship_Name__c) || isblank(Relationship_Field_Child__c) ), false, true )
&& if ( !isblank(Snapshot_Object__c) && (isblank(Snapshot_Relationship_Name__c) || isblank(Relationship_Field_Snapshot__c) ), false, true )
, 'Ready',
if(!Active__c, 'Not Active' +br(), '') + if (isblank(Parent_Object__c), 'Parent Object Required' + br(), '' ) + if ((isblank(Child_Object__c) && isblank(Snapshot_Object__c) ), 'Child and/or Snapshot Object Required' + br(), '') + if (isblank(text(Frequency__c)), 'No Timeframe Selected' +br(), '') + if (Active_Fields__c = 0, 'No Active Fields' +br(), '') + if ( !isblank(Child_Object__c) && isblank(Child_Relationship_Name__c), 'No Child Relationship Name' + br(), '') + if ( !isblank(Child_Object__c) && isblank(Relationship_Field_Child__c), 'No Relationship Field (on Child)' + br(), '') + if (!isblank(Snapshot_Object__c) && isblank(Snapshot_Relationship_Name__c), 'No Snapshot Relationship Name' + br(), '') + if (!isblank(Snapshot_Object__c) && isblank(Relationship_Field_Snapshot__c), 'No Relationship Field (on Snapshot)' + br(), '')
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A summary of any issues with the configuration of the task. Â If all is good, it'll show "Ready"
CustomField.label: Task Status
